channel.title: Fucking help
channel.description:
ffs.. can someone atleast help me for what to put in the boxes with the portforwarding
Kihomura - this can not be just a computer problem it can be a fucking server problem too.. i need help trying to run a server, isnt this what the site is about? everyone needs to portforward to run a server and this is the only place for me to post a topic for me to get help.. so seriously, stop fucking locking my posts.
NOW, Could someone please help me?
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2hnnajp.jpg[/img]

item.title: Fucking help

item.title: Fucking help
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Then it’s a modem, not router, router is pure digital data, modem is analog, thats why routers have ariels and modems don’t, also with routers you can have more then one computer getting internet.

It’s your server n8, try editing the EGUI in client.java

Just search for 127

And edit the 3 ips 2 urs, if that doesn’t work, then get a working server

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking help
item.dc:creator: @gh0st_dr0pz gh0st dr0pz
item.description:
@gh0st_dr0pz wrote:

the modem is a 2701HGV-W, but apparently it has a modem and a router in it. i have already downloaded no-ip and done all that. i have tried to run the server, it only lets me on and no-one else. if there is more answers to this, please help?

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking help
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

look, for one we need your router info, like the model number etc… Also, are you using a modem, or router? If your using a modem then you don’t need 2 port forward, just open up ya server, go to server.java then search for the default name (127.0.0.1 i think) From there change to what u want ur server 2 be called.

Now download no-ip.com and make a new server name (not 2 diffecult, i managed without help) From there keep clicking box untill the face goes rosey, not happy.

When youve done that open up ya server, try logging into it with the server name from no-ip.com, and it should work.

Hope this helps, johno

Read full topic
